Uses of Class
ben.ladalja.QueryBuilder

    • Uses of QueryBuilder in ben.ladalja

      Classes in ben.ladalja with type parameters of type QueryBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  QueryBuilder<T extends QueryBuilder>
      Ladalja's database query builder provides a convenient, fluent interface to creating and running database queries.
      It can be used to perform most database operations in your application and works on all supported database systems.
      Subclasses of QueryBuilder in ben.ladalja 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  QueryBuilderORM
      This class is just a custom QueryBuilder for model
      The main difference is that class return models instead of java.sql.ResultSet
      When you are using this class, don't use the inherited methods, use redefined instead otherwise UnsupportedOperationException will be throw for example instead of use QueryBuilderORM.get(), use QueryBuilderORM.get(Class) where Class is the model class you want to be returned
      Methods in ben.ladalja that return QueryBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static QueryBuilder DB.table(java.lang.String tableName)
      Make new instance of QueryBuilder
